p: At last, mannans should be mentioned. They have been reported to possess adjuvant-vaccine properties in clinical studies, probably mediated by its interaction with mannose receptors. Particularly, it has been shown that oxidized mannan-mucin 1 can be useful as an adjuvant in the breast cancer immunotherapy. Indeed, a 12â€“15 years follow-up has highlighted that it decreases the cancer recurrence rate and prolongs recurrence time, without inducing toxicity or adverse reactions [ 124].
